name: Rag Me Down
description:
Simple Tamagotchi, Feed it, Clean it, Play With It, Collect its poop, Simple.
Collect some furniture for your pet and watch it evolve!

Instructions:

-Pet System, 
-- Poop drops from your pet! Pick it up and shove that crap in there, thats our currency in this world!
-- Egg takes around 30 seconds to hatch into stage 1, it goes through 2 more after that.
--The Brush Will Increase Cleanliness, as well as Energy!
--Food Will Decrease Hunger, and Energy!
--Playing with your pet will increase Hunger , but Decrease Energy and Cleanliness!

-Die System,
-- Play Against the Big Dino to earn some money!
--If you chose attack, Your die must be greater than Big Dino's Die- or you lose.
--If you chose defend, Your die must be Equal to or Lower than Big Dino's Die- or you lose!

Thanks all for playing my first Game Jam Game! I've only been programming/coding for 2 months and only had a day to work on this, so the code is really choppy and is just the bare bones. But had a great time and learned a lot! If you have any suggestions of feed back let me know!
